featured.text: It may take some years, but the final aim is to release all of them to a wild herd.
As a record number of fans showed up for the baseball final, the highways around the stadium were with traffic all day.
After 11 years of work, the final section of the road was completed in 1932.
Here is a sentence: “Almost nothing of a fish is left for the trash bin.” Which paragraph is most suitable to have it as the final sentence?
Finally, on 25 June 1977, a seventh and final bolt struck Sullivan as he was fishing in a pond.

other.text: Which paragraph is most suitable to have it as the final sentence?
Then it is the tortoise that 34 the hare to a third race along a different route in which there is a river just before the final destination.

definition.zh_def: 最終的，最後的，決定性的。
definition.example: The final exam will determine your overall grade.
